quotes.author: Monkey D. Luffy
quotes.quote: I'm gonna be King of the Pirates!

quotes.author: Naruto Uzumaki
quotes.quote: I'm not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! That's my ninja way!

quotes.author: Goku
quotes.quote: I am the hope of the universe. I am the answer to all living things that cry out for peace.

quotes.author: Saitama
quotes.quote: I'm just a guy who's a hero for fun.
